spec_data.Name: texlive-nkarta
spec_data.Description:
A development of the karta font, offering more mathematical
stability in Metafont. A version that will produce the glyphs
as Encapsulated PostScript, using MetaPost, is also provided.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 08:31:36 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A "new" version of the karta cartographic fonts
